name: Interstellar Rivals
description:
Fight between two rivals through space and time. 

Increase your multiplier and throw more enemy waves towards your rival.

MAIN MENU:

- START--->Insert

- QUIT--->Page Up

Player 1 controls:

- MOVEMENT: W,A,S,D

- SHOOTING: J

- DASH: U

P2 controls: 

- MOVEMENT: ^, <, v, >

- SHOOTING: DELETE

- DASH: INSERT

PAUSE MENU: HOME

RESUME: HOME

BACK TO MENU: Page Down

TEAM

DESIGNER: Ricardo Aguado Chena

PROGRAMMERS: Darío Muñoz and Arturo Vilar

ARTIST: Houssame Kairane
